name: Vault Resort
description: You are a prisoner in a vault. Waking up in a dirty scary cellar, you have to find your way out. By exploring various scenarios and surroundings, you must solve physical puzzles and handle exiting challenges. Vault resort is a real-life obstacle course inside a huge castle and its surroundings.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or newer, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or better, AMD FX 8350 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or better Storage: 1 GB available space
